meanings.definition: A person or group that holds a title or championship.
meanings.sent1: The titleholders of the spelling bee were excited to receive their trophies.
meanings.sent2: The titleholders of the soccer tournament proudly displayed their medals.
meanings.sent3: The titleholders of the hot dog eating contest celebrated with a feast.
meanings.sent4: The titleholders of the dance competition moved gracefully like royalty.
meanings.sent5: The titleholders of the science fair experiments amazed the judges with their creativity.

meanings.definition: The owner of a particular title or position.
meanings.sent1: As the titleholders of the company, they were responsible for making important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The titleholders of the land ensured that it was well-maintained and cared for.
meanings.sent3: The titleholders of the best friend title always had each other's backs.
meanings.sent4: She was the titleholder of the fastest runner in the school, leaving others in awe.
meanings.sent5: The titleholders of the highest grades in the class were praised for their hard work.
